original_title: The Legend of Virgil & His Traveling Merchandise Table
overview: He is described by many as a “pop culture icon” and his eight-year stint as a featured WWF/WWE personality only scratches the surface as to why!  After years of online discussion, debate, and speculation, finally, one release that completely encapsulates “The Legend of Virgil”.
tagline: The world of Virgil according to Virgil and those that hate him
title: The Legend of Virgil & His Traveling Merchandise Table
